column1: Hilda Bianca is a woman of Lake-town played by Sarah Peirse in the The Hobbit (film series) film trilogy.
She observed Bard smuggling Bilbo Baggins and Thorin and Company into his home
column2: and told others of what she saw.The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug After the destruction of Lake-town by Smaug
column3: she was the most vocal about Bard taking the lead and helping the survivors seek refuge. She also repeatedly tried to expose Alfrids treachery and cowardice.The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
